  • Packages that use AgentEvent 
    Package Description
    example.compositePingPong
    The scenario of two agents which ping messages between them (one sends and one replies).

    The scenario of two agents which ping messages between them (one sends and one replies).

    The package contains the agent interface.

      Subclasses of AgentEvent in net.xqhs.flash.core.agent 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AgentWave
      The wave is a type of event that conveys information between two entities, whether these entities are agents, shards inside different agents, or shards inside the same agent.
      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core.agent with parameters of type AgentEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void AgentEvent.AgentEventHandler.handleEvent​(AgentEvent event)
      The method is invoked whenever the event is posted to the CompositeAgent the component is part of.

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingQueue<AgentEvent> CompositeAgent.eventQueue
      A synchronized queue of agent events, as posted by the shards or by the agent itself.
      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite with parameters of type AgentEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected boolean CompositeAgent.canPostEvent​(AgentEvent event)
      Checks whether the specified event can be posted in the current agent state.
      void CompositeAgent.CompositeAgentShardContainer.postAgentEvent​(AgentEvent event)  
      protected boolean CompositeAgent.postAgentEvent​(AgentEvent event)
      The method should be called by an agent shard (relayed through AgentShard) to disseminate a an AgentEvent to the other shards.

    • Uses of AgentEvent in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard

      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard with parameters of type AgentEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ShardContainer.postAgentEvent​(AgentEvent event)
      Agent shards should call this method to signal to the agent a new event (e.g.
      void ShardContext.postAgentEvent​(AgentEvent event)
      The method should be called by a shard to post an agent event, via this proxy.
      void AgentShard.signalAgentEvent​(AgentEvent event)
      This method should be called by the agent containing the shard in order to signal to the shard that an agent event has been generated inside the agent.
      void AgentShardCore.signalAgentEvent​(AgentEvent event)
      The method calls is called by the parent Agent when an event occurs.
